resources.string: After the module is activated, you can forcibly activate the full animation of MIUI 12.5
Your device supports MIUI 12.5 full animation
Your device only supports MIUI 12.5 partial animations
Your device does not support MIUI 12.5 animation
Unable to get the level of your device
Xposed module is actived but not enabled

MIUI 12.5 full animation has been forcibly opened for you.
Note: Due to device performance limitations, some animations may cause hangs.

Once the module is enabled, you can forcibly activate MIUI 12.5 full animation.
Tap here to go to Xposed manager and enable the module.
Note: Due to device performance limitations, some animations may cause hangs.
MIUI may mark some models as \"Lite\" version. Devices marked as lite version will be considered "low-end" devices regardless of performance, and most of them have animation disabled.
It seems that you are not using MIUI
The detection results of this software only apply to mobile phones using the MIUI system.
Version: %1$s(%2$d)\nIt helps you to check the MIUI 12.5 rating of your model.
